entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
